duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain accurate accounting records for renewable energy and investment entity portfolios
Update internal systems with financial data
Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports
Maintain purchase orders and reconcile vendor statements
Research, track, and restore accounting or documentation problems and discrepancies
Generate customer invoices and distribute them monthly
Collect W-9 forms for all vendor services and assist with end-of-year 1099 documents
Manage and update a comprehensive financial management calendar
Complete inputs to bookkeeping platform and download all financial statements
Audit employee credit card receipts for documentation compliance
Open and distribute incoming physical and electronic mail daily
Answer phone calls, take messages, support scheduling, and prepare requested forms
Develop and maintain customer and partner relationships
Manage office supply inventory and requisition additional items
Manage travel arrangements and accommodations for senior management
Complete research and data entry projects

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) required, Associate's degree in Accounting or related field preferred
